Posts.Content:
How are you doing honey? How's your treatment going? I've been MIA, lots going on with me, not all good unfortunately. Last time we spoke you had just been to see your oncologist and were feeling a bit overwhelmed. Really hope you are doing well, have been thinking of you. My email address is listed if you want to email me. Take care Merrida. 
Jane x
Posts.Title: Merrida

Posts.Content:
Merrida, I'm sorry you are hurting so much. I agree that you should contact your surgeon. It's probably nothing to worry about
 but you shouldn't have to suffer like this. I am sure there is more to help. Make sure you continue to do nothing, just relax as much as you can and build up your strength again. Thinking of you, I hope you get your biopsy results today to save you waiting over the weekend. Praying the results are good. 
(((hugs)))
Jane

Posts.Title: Merida

Posts.Content:
Merrida, that's great news. I've been wondering how you were. Forgive me for not being in touch but I'm twelve days post op double spinal fusion, and struggling!
I pray and hope this marks the end of your cancer journey and that the lymph oedema settles by itself. I told you you'd come out the other end, bet a huge weight has lifted for you and your lovely husband!!
Take care
Jane xx
Posts.Title: Ta-Da! Graduated today!

Posts.Content:
I'm not surprised it jolted you, of course it would. But all the signs are good. Just look at it as the next step in your journey. Before you know it, it will all be in the past. I know it's easy for me to say, but you hang in there. You are doing incredibly well, we're all proud of you and rooting for you. 
Do you begin radiotherapy soon? Is that over several weeks? I'm thinking of you, let me know how next Wednesday goes. 
(((Hugs)))
Jane
Posts.Title: Merida

Posts.Content:
Sorry to hear that Merrida, you are a strong lady and you will get through this. The main thing is to make sure the cancer cells get killed off and never return. It must be horrible contemplating chemo and radiation but you have amazing support and that is the key to getting through it all. 
Thinking of you as always, my email address is listed if you ever want to chat. Stay strong honey
(((Hugs)))
Jane x
Posts.Title: Merida

Posts.Content:
Merrida, sounds like it was a good appointment with the exception of pain relief. I guess you just have to hope that as the days go by, the pain should decrease. The girls must be very traumatized and there will be bruising and swelling. I really hope things improve soon. Sorry you didn't get the path report, you'll be on edge until that comes through. 
I was told that it takes a lot to damage fusions, so here's hoping that's true and you don't have yet something else to worry about
. I think you have enough on your plate!
Continue to rest and give your girls a chance to heal. Praying things improve soon. 
Take care honey
Jane

Thinking of you as always, take care honey.

Posts.Title: New to BC, surgery tomorrow, intro

Posts.Content:
Merrida
My feeling is that there would be something wrong if you weren't feeling a bit low. The word cancer is enough to cause shock, fear depression and a whole host of other natural feelings. I think you are suffering from a natural reaction to what the last weeks and months have thrown at you. It was bad enough before the word cancer reared it's ugly head. You are bound to go between feelings of thinking you can beat this to the real lows and fear of the unknown. 
I don't know a lot about
 chemo, although I did have a friend go through it many years ago. The methods of delivery and the side effects seem to be better than years ago. And I know you will get through it, it wouldn't be for long and if there is even the smallest chance of the cancer migrating then I know you'd rather accept chemo than take any chances. And you still don't know yet if it will be necessary. You have a great team behind you, trust them. They will be doing all they can to keep you safe. 
Take each day as it comes. Try not to spend too much time on your own thinking. Distract yourself, and above all be good to yourself. You are allowed to be spoilt and spoil yourself just now. And never forget just how strong you are...even if that's not quite how you are feeling just now. Email me anytime, I would love to chat privately with you. 
(((Happy hugs)))
Jane x
